titles.title: Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib and condemning antisemitism.
Censuring Representative Rashida Tlaib and condemning antisemitism.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Ethics, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This resolution censures Representative Rashida Tlaib. The resolution also condemns all forms of anti-Semitism as a threat to democracy and overall safety and well-being for Jewish Americans.
